<title level="1" pfs="">[Nwanyian Archer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2088)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 25

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Nwanyian Archer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2088)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 36</row>

**Perception** +17

**Languages**
[Drooni](/Languages.aspx?ID=100)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +17, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +1

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Swift Sneak** The archer can move their full Speed while [Sneaking](/Actions.aspx?ID=63).

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74)_ (20 arrows), _[holy water](/Equipment.aspx?ID=245)_, [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 115

**Spry Dodge** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The archer is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker they can see; **Effect** The archer gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, the archer can Step.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+8 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_composite longbow_ +18 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d8+8 piercing

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The archer's Strikes deal an additional 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Surprise Attack**   On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to the archer.

</column>
name: Nwanyian Archer

If the attack misses, the archer can Step. --- Speed 30 feet Melee Single Action shortsword +18 (Agile, Finesse, versatile S), Damage 1d6+8 piercing Ranged Single Action composite longbow +18 (deadly d10, Magical, Propulsive, volley 30 feet, range increment 100 feet), Damage 2d8+8 piercing Sneak Attack The archer's Strikes deal an additional 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.
